p: In addition, a discharge plateau with wide and flat shape appears in all the discharge voltage curves. Urchin-like MnO 2 micromaterial has a plateau at about 0.32 V from 120 to 1,100 mAh g −1 during the first discharging process and has a plateau from 50 to 360 mAh g −1 in the second cycling. The caddice-clew-like MnO 2 micromaterial has similar discharge plateau. The discharge plateau may bring stable discharge current to the battery prepared by MnO 2 micromaterials. According to the results of discharge specific capacity, urchin-like MnO 2 micromaterial was better than caddice-clew-like MnO 2 micromaterial.
